title: Alien
comment: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission

title: Léon:The Professional
comment: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
comment: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Westworld
comment: At the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, waits a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.

title: X
comment: At the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, waits a world in which every human appetite can be indulged without consequence.
